listing_company_name: Luton Properties - Weston Creek & Molonglo Valley
description:
With captivating views to Mount Taylor, and an ultra-convenient location opposite Mawson shopping centre, this light-filled one bedroom unit offers an affordable first step into property ownership, or superb addition to your investment portfolio.

Situated on the third floor, the unit features an open plan living and meals area opening, through large glass sliding doors, to a generously-sized covered balcony. The kitchen, with an electric stove, adjoins the meals area and has plenty of storage options.

The spacious bedroom has a built-in wardrobe and opens to the bathroom which includes a laundry area, a shower over the bath and a good sized vanity.

A single allocated carport space comes with the unit and there are additional visitor parking spaces.

With a rental return of approx. $380 per week and potential gross yield of approx. 7.6% investors will see the additional value in the unit's location, just a short drive or cycle to Phillip business area, Westfield Woden, Canberra Hospital and Woden's Government departments and offices.

Tired after many years as a rental property this neat little gem is the perfect starter for a first home buyer. Priced to sell, it offers a fantastic alternative to life on the rental roundabout, and is all about the chance to create your perfect personal space. Be quick, be sure to inspect - contact the agent to arrange.

Features:
-Top floor, one bedroom, one bathroom unit
-Bright and sun-filled open plan living/meals area
-Kitchen with abundant storage, electric stove, small fridge
-Covered, private balcony off living room,
-Fabulous outlook over Mount Taylor
-Good-sized bedroom with built-in wardrobe
-Combined bathroom & laundry with shower over bath
-Single allocated carport
-Storage cage
-Complex with manicured gardens
-Opposite Mawson shopping centre & amenities
-Short drive to Phillip and Woden town centre
-Close to parks, Farrer Ridge and Oakey Hill Nature Reserves
-Built: 1982
-Rental Appraisal: Approx. $380 per week

-EER: 0
Rates: $1293.27pa
Land Tax (if rented): $1453.63
Strata Fees (Admin & Sinking Funds): $445.40pq
-Living: 38m²
-Balcony: 9m²
-Carport: 13.4m²
-Storeroom: 4.55 m²
All measurements, amounts and values are approximate and not to be relied upon. It is important for buyers to make their own enquiries.
